memberdef.argsstring: (int r, int g, int b, int a=255)
memberdef.name: fromRGB

briefdescription.para: Creates a color from RGB byte values (0-255).
Creates a color from a 32-bit hex value (0xRRGGBB or 0xRRGGBBAA).

parameterdescription.para: If true, expects 0xRRGGBBAA format; otherwise 0xRRGGBB with alpha = 1.0.

briefdescription.para: Creates a color with modified alpha.
Standard color palette providing commonly used colors as vec4f (RGBA).

detaileddescription.para: All colors are defined in normalized RGBA format with components in [0.0, 1.0]. Alpha is set to 1.0 (fully opaque) by default.
